title: Transformation matrix
summary: In linear algebra, linear transformations can be represented by matrices.  If T {\displaystyle T} is a linear transformation mapping R n {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} ^{n}} to R m {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} ^{m}} and x {\displaystyle \mathbf {x} } is a column vector with n {\displaystyle n} entries, then
